name: MinimizeWindows
author: kafeijao
description:
Simple mod allows you to automatically Minimize Game/Melon Loader Console Windows when starting the game. By default it will Minimize the Game window when starting in VR.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/MinimizeWindows) for more in-depth info.
